meanings.definition: A person of low social status or rank.
meanings.sent1: The peons in the village were always kind and helpful.
meanings.sent2: The company hired peons to do the cleaning and maintenance work.
meanings.sent3: The peons organized a surprise party for the mayor.
meanings.sent4: In the kingdom of ants, the worker ants are the peons of the queen.
meanings.sent5: Despite their lowly status, the peons were the backbone of the community.

meanings.sent1: The peons at the construction site carried heavy loads all day.
meanings.sent2: The farm employed peons to harvest the crops.
meanings.sent3: The peons joked around during their lunch break.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, the pawns are like peons on the battlefield.
meanings.sent5: The peons worked diligently to complete the project on time.
